ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] 7th Coldain Prayer Shawl
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats! I ve never been able to get past the 4th shawl on two of my toons... I get impatient, lol. But I m going to try and give it another shot. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats! I've never been able to get past the 4th
shawl on two of my toons... I get impatient, lol. But
I'm going to try and give it another shot.

--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
>
WOOOOOOOOOOOOHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
> After a long long long time of working on my skills,
> farming the items, and
> spending almost all of my money... I finally did it!
> I failed a combine a couple times and lost two runed
> sea shells (which were
> the most expensive thing I had to buy for it-- I
> tried hunting in SG but
> didn't have any luck). I got my JC to 173, my
> tailoring to 176, fletching to
> 180, brewing to 184, pottery to 154, and smithing to
> 112. I got impatient on
> the pottery and just asked someone to put the water
> and the velium powder
> (made from the runed sea shell and a small brick of
> velium in a mortar and
> pestle-- no fail combine) in a pottery wheel and got
> my Unfired Rune. I
> fired the rune. I bought a geerlok gemsetter.
> Borrowed a geerlok planing
> tool for my fletching for the combines. and borrowed
> a geerlok sewing kit
> for the final combine. Had C3 on and success!!
> I now have my Runed Coldain Prayer Shawl!
> Now I need to work on JC and Smithing some more for
> my 8th shawl...
> luv,
> -Su
>
>
